deals.title: Buy 2 Get 1 Free
deals.description: Buy any two scoops and get a third scoop of your choice absolutely free!
deals.terms: Valid on all flavors. Not combinable with other offers. One per customer per visit.

deals.title: Happy Hour Special
deals.description: 20% off all ice cream between 2-4 PM on weekdays
deals.terms: Valid Monday to Friday 2-4 PM only. Cannot be combined with other promotions.

deals.title: First Order Discount
deals.description: Get 15% off your first purchase of organic produce
deals.terms: Valid for new customers only. Minimum purchase of $30 required.

deals.title: Remote Worker Special
deals.description: Free coffee refill with any food purchase
deals.terms: Valid Monday to Friday. Show proof of remote work (laptop required). Max 2 refills.

deals.title: Early Bird Coffee
deals.description: 25% off all coffee drinks before 9 AM
deals.terms: Valid 6 AM - 9 AM daily. One drink per customer.

deals.title: New Collection Launch
deals.description: 30% off all new arrivals in sustainable activewear
deals.terms: Valid on new collection items only. While supplies last.

deals.title: Lunch Combo Deal
deals.description: Poutine + Drink for just $12.99
deals.terms: Valid 11 AM - 3 PM Monday to Friday. Dine-in only.

deals.title: Weekend Brunch Special
deals.description: Free maple syrup drizzle on any brunch item
deals.terms: Valid Saturday and Sunday 9 AM - 2 PM. Dine-in only.

deals.title: Book Club Members
deals.description: 10% off all purchases for book club members
deals.terms: Must show valid book club membership card. Not valid on already discounted items.

deals.title: Buy 3 Books Get 1 Free
deals.description: Purchase any 3 books and get the cheapest one free
deals.terms: Equal or lesser value item free. Cannot combine with other offers.

deals.title: Trade-In Bonus
deals.description: Extra 20% off when you trade in your old electronics
deals.terms: Old electronics must be in working condition. Trade-in value determined by staff.

deals.title: First Visit Special
deals.description: 50% off your first massage or spa treatment
deals.terms: New customers only. 60-minute treatments only. Advance booking required.

deals.title: Couples Package
deals.description: Book couples massage and get 30% off total
deals.terms: Must book for 2 people. 90-minute sessions. Subject to availability.

deals.title: Family Night Special
deals.description: Kids eat free with every adult entree purchased (Tuesdays only)
deals.terms: Valid Tuesdays only. One free kids meal per adult entree. Kids 12 and under.

deals.title: Wine & Dine Wednesday
deals.description: 50% off all wine bottles on Wednesdays
deals.terms: Valid Wednesdays only. Dine-in only. Must be 19+.

deals.title: Grooming Package Deal
deals.description: Full grooming service + nail trim for $45 (save $15)
deals.terms: By appointment only. For dogs up to 50 lbs. Additional charges for larger dogs.

deals.title: Loyalty Rewards
deals.description: Buy 10 bags of premium pet food, get 1 free
deals.terms: Valid on same product only. Loyalty card required. Expires after 6 months.

deals.title: Student Discount
deals.description: 15% off all drinks with valid student ID
deals.terms: Valid student ID required. Cannot be combined with other offers.

deals.title: Loyalty Card Special
deals.description: Buy 5 drinks, get the 6th free
deals.terms: Loyalty card available at counter. Free drink of equal or lesser value.

deals.title: Seasonal Sale
deals.description: 40% off last season's collection
deals.terms: Selected items only. While stocks last. Final sale - no returns or exchanges.

deals.title: Personal Styling Session
deals.description: Free 30-minute styling consultation with purchase over $100
deals.terms: By appointment only. Minimum $100 purchase required. One session per customer.

deals.title: Sushi Tuesday
deals.description: All sushi rolls $2 off on Tuesdays
deals.terms: Valid Tuesdays only. Dine-in and takeout. Not valid on specialty rolls.

deals.title: Lunch Bento Box
deals.description: Complete bento box lunch for $13.99
deals.terms: Valid 11:30 AM - 2:30 PM weekdays only. Includes miso soup and salad.

deals.title: Early Bird Enrollment
deals.description: $500 off any bootcamp if you enroll 2+ weeks in advance
deals.terms: Must enroll at least 14 days before course start. Non-refundable deposit required.

deals.title: Referral Bonus
deals.description: Refer a friend and both get $200 off
deals.terms: Referred student must enroll and complete payment. Discount applied after enrollment.

deals.title: Monthly Membership
deals.description: Join monthly membership and save 25% on all services
deals.terms: Monthly fee of $49. Minimum 3-month commitment. Unlimited service discounts.

deals.title: Birthday Month Special
deals.description: Free facial with any service during your birthday month
deals.terms: Valid ID required. Must book during birth month. 30-minute facial treatment.

deals.title: Takeout Tuesday
deals.description: 20% off all takeout orders on Tuesdays
deals.terms: Valid Tuesdays only. Takeout orders only. Minimum order $20.
